nodes.name: BountyIssued

devdoc.author: Peter (based on tute)
devdoc.details: Smart contract that allows a user to issue a bounty in ETH for the fulfilment of a task.

acceptFulfilment(uint256,uint256).details: acceptFulfilment(): accepts a submitted fulfilment and pays the BountyFulfiled

cancelBounty(uint256).details: cancelBounty(): cancels a bounty and returns the funds to the issuer

params._bountyId: the id of the bounty to cancel

fulfilBounty(uint256,string).details: fulfilBounty(): submit a fulfilment of a bounty

params._data: the IPFS hash containing evidence of fulfilment

params._deadline: the Unix timestamp after which fulfilments will no longer be accepted

devdoc.title: Bounties
